game.title: Slay the Evil Lich and bring peace to the kingdom.
game.objective: Slay the Evil Lich and bring peace to the kingdom.
game.description: The Evil Lich has been terrorizing the kingdom for years, and it's up to you to stop him. Travel to his lair, defeat his minions, and face him in a final showdown.
game.reward: A powerful magical artifact and the gratitude of the kingdom.

task.description: To reach the Lich's Lair, you must travel through the treacherous Swamp of Sorrows. beware of the dangerous creatures that lurk in the shadows.
Once you reach the Lich's Lair, you must face his hordes of undead minions. Be prepared for a tough fight.
Finally, you will come face to face with the Evil Lich. He is a powerful foe, so be sure to come prepared.

task.objective: Defeat the Evil Lich and bring peace to the kingdom.
task.description: Once you defeat the Evil Lich, you must bring peace to the kingdom. It's up to you to make sure that everything is in order after the final showdown.
